description: Detects usage of the WMI class "Win32_NTEventlogFile" in a potentially suspicious way (delete, backup, change permissions, etc.) from a PowerShell script
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Potentially Suspicious Call To Win32_NTEventlogFile Class
query: (process.command_line.text:"*Win32_NTEventlogFile*" AND process.command_line.text:("*.BackupEventlog\(*" OR "*.ChangeSecurityPermissions\(*" OR "*.ChangeSecurityPermissionsEx\(*" OR "*.ClearEventLog\(*" OR "*.Delete\(*" OR "*.DeleteEx\(*" OR "*.Rename\(*" OR "*.TakeOwnerShip\(*" OR "*.TakeOwnerShipEx\(*"))
